Text: RE MAC Amendment Cc t have a problem but would like to know why the change for Goldman Group That is a defined term see Part Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From Carol St Clair mailto Sent Tuesday June PM To Giessen Luanne Cc Tana Jones Subject MAC Amendment Luanne Our credit person is fine with revising the MAC language to say taht a MAC would be triggered if either an entitys Credit Support Providers rating from SP is below BBB by SP or Baa by Moodys or if such Credit Support Provider fails to be rated by both SP and Moodys Also in Sections and of the ISDA Schedule we would like to change the reference to Goldman Group to The Goldman Sachs Group Inc I will have Tana Jones draft an amendment and send it to you Call me if there are any problems with the above Tana Please draft an amendment for my review Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax

RE Revised DocumentCarol and I agreed that the credit test for both parties would be SP AND Moodys yet Moodys was not added in the amendment for Party B Enron I have revised the amendment in this form it is acceptable to Aron Please prepare execution copies and send them to me at Goldman Sachs Co One New York Plaza New York NY Thank you Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From Tana Jones mailto Sent Friday June AM To Giessen Luanne Subject Revised Document Luanne I missed a few of Carols changes so she asked me to resend the document Sorry See attached file amdDOC

RE Revised Document Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From mailto Sent Friday June AM To Giessen Luanne Subject RE Revised Document I dont think your attachment was attached Giessen Luanne To Tana Jones luannegiess cc Subject RE Revised Document AM Tana Carol and I agreed that the credit test for both parties would be SP AND Moodys yet Moodys was not added in the amendment for Party B Enron I have revised the amendment in this form it is acceptable to Aron Please prepare execution copies and send them to me at Goldman Sachs Co One New York Plaza New York NY Thank you Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From Tana Jones mailto Sent Friday June AM To Giessen Luanne Subject Revised Document Luanne I missed a few of Carols changes so she asked me to resend the document Sorry See attached file amdDOC Enron NA amendmentDOC

RE MAC Language Cc my understanding but when I saw your draft I thought you had changed your mind Please revise the draft to those terms and resend it to me Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From Carol St Clair mailto Sent Wednesday July PM To Giessen Luanne Cc Tana Jones Subject MAC Language Luanne I made a mistake on the language that we sent you on MAC On the last part where it talks about a failure to be rated my understanding from our discussions is that a MAC would only be triggered if a partys credit support provider failed to be rated by either SP or Moodys so that if it lost one rating but maintained the other rating a MAC would not be triggered For this reason the amendment should read or its Credit Support Provider shall fail to have a rating from either SP or Moodys Please confirm that this is your understanding and sorry for the confusion Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax

RE MAC Amendment Cc t have a problem but would like to know why the change for Goldman Group That is a defined term see Part Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From Carol St Clair mailto Sent Tuesday June PM To Giessen Luanne Cc Tana Jones Subject MAC Amendment Luanne Our credit person is fine with revising the MAC language to say taht a MAC would be triggered if either an entitys Credit Support Providers rating from SP is below BBB by SP or Baa by Moodys or if such Credit Support Provider fails to be rated by both SP and Moodys Also in Sections and of the ISDA Schedule we would like to change the reference to Goldman Group to The Goldman Sachs Group Inc I will have Tana Jones draft an amendment and send it to you Call me if there are any problems with the above Tana Please draft an amendment for my review Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax

RE MAC Language Cc my understanding but when I saw your draft I thought you had changed your mind Please revise the draft to those terms and resend it to me Luanne Giessen Telephone Facsimile email address Original Message From Carol St Clair mailto Sent Wednesday July PM To Giessen Luanne Cc Tana Jones Subject MAC Language Luanne I made a mistake on the language that we sent you on MAC On the last part where it talks about a failure to be rated my understanding from our discussions is that a MAC would only be triggered if a partys credit support provider failed to be rated by either SP or Moodys so that if it lost one rating but maintained the other rating a MAC would not be triggered For this reason the amendment should read or its Credit Support Provider shall fail to have a rating from either SP or Moodys Please confirm that this is your understanding and sorry for the confusion Carol St Clair EB Phone Fax
